rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall leading into an open-plan living area with ample natural light from large windows. The design adheres to Vastu principles by orienting the main door northward and ensuring a balanced layout.
The master bedroom is designed with private ensuite bathroom and closet space. The orientation of the room considers Vastu guidelines for health and prosperity.
A spacious bedroom with adequate ventilation, designed to cater to the needs of a joint family member. Placed in a direction that promotes balance and energy flow.
A modern dining room adjacent to the living area. Natural light and ventilation are optimized following local building norms.
Efficient kitchen with modern appliances and a pantry. Layout ensures safe and convenient access from the dining area, following Vastu recommendations for culinary spaces.
A shared family bathroom designed to maximize space and ease of access. The placement is in line with Vastu principles.
Dedicated servant quarters located near the kitchen for convenience. The layout ensures privacy and adheres to local building norms.
A compact utility room for storage of cleaning supplies and maintenance tools. Positioning is considered to optimize workflow in the household.

openings.description: Large entrance door oriented northward to welcome positive energy according to Vastu. Equipped with modern security features.
Multiple strategically placed windows ensuring natural light and ventilation across all rooms. Sized in accordance with local building norms and Vastu guidelines.
Internal doors designed for ease of movement, ensuring smooth connectivity between rooms while maintaining privacy.
